questions.question: What is structured data?
options: Data stored in rows and columns with a defined schema
Any data saved in a text file
Data that has never been cleaned

questions.question: Which of the following is an example of unstructured data?
options: A database table of employee salaries
A collection of social media posts
A CSV file of product prices

questions.question: In supervised learning, the training data includes:
options: Input features paired with correct output labels

questions.question: What is the goal of a machine learning model during training?
options: To memorize every training example exactly
To minimize prediction error on the training data
To maximize the number of parameters
To store all data in RAM
